attributes.action: Substantially increase the sentencing guidelines fordrivers causing death whilst driving an uninsured vehicle,driving without a license, leaving the scene of the accident and attempting to pervert the course of justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been set up to gain support for a change in the justice system, to ensure that the courts are able to set sentences appropriate to crimes involving driving whilst uninsured, whilst unlicensed, not stopping at the scene of the accident and then attempting to pervert the course of justice.
